question.title: Friend Requests I: Overall Acceptance Rate
question.translatedTitle: 好友申请 I：总体通过率
hints: Still remember how to count the number of rows in a table?
What is the keyword to filter the duplicated records in a table?
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists FriendRequest (sender_id int, send_to_id int, request_date date)
Create table If Not Exists RequestAccepted (requester_id int, accepter_id int, accept_date date)
